description: This file defines a route layout component for a Qwik-based frontend application. It imports styling, handles caching via an HTTP GET request handler, and renders a main slot for nested routes or content.

methods.name: onGet
methods.description: Defines a request handler for HTTP GET requests that sets cache control headers for caching strategy.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Creates a Qwik component that renders a main element with a nested Slot, enabling nested content injection.

methods.name: useStyles$
methods.description: Applies imported styles to the component.
